00018 public class SystemLayouter {
00019 
00020     final Integer distanceBetweenPorts          = new Integer(60);
00021     final Integer distanceBetweenSystmes        = new Integer(90);
00022     final Integer blockSizeHoriz                = new Integer(250);
00023     final Integer blockSizeVert                         = new Integer(100);
00024     final Integer portSizeHoriz                 = new Integer(30);
00025     final Integer portSizeVert                  = new Integer(14);
00026 
00027     private Integer top     = new Integer(40);
00028     private Integer left    = new Integer(35);
00029     private Integer bottom  = new Integer(0);
00030     private Integer right   = new Integer(0);
00031 
00036         public void startWithSystems() {
00037         top    = 40;
00038         left   = -140;
00039         }
00040 
00045         public void startWithOutports() {
00046         left = left + distanceBetweenSystmes + blockSizeHoriz;
00047         if (left < 0) {left = 100; }
00048         top = 50;
00049         }
00050 
00055         public String nextPort() {
00056         top = top + distanceBetweenPorts;
00057         bottom = top + portSizeVert;
00058         right = left + portSizeHoriz;
00059         String position = buildPositionString();         
00060                 return position;
00061         }
00062 
00063         
00068         public String nextSystem() {
00069         left = left + distanceBetweenSystmes + blockSizeHoriz;
00070         bottom = top + blockSizeVert;
00071         right = left + blockSizeHoriz;
00072         String position = buildPositionString();
00073                 return position;
00074         }
00075 
00076         private String buildPositionString() {
00077                 String format = "[%d %d %d %d]";
00078                 String position = String.format(format, left, top, right, bottom);
00079                 return position;
00080         }
